text: Rotuma is a volcanic island about south of Fiji.rotuma.net: Rotuma Website It covers an area of about . It has been a part of Fiji since 1881. While the Fijian Islands are Melanesian, Rotuma is isolated far to the north. Its people and culture are more closely related to Polynesia. ==References== Category:Islands of Fiji Category:Provinces of Fiji
title: Rotuma
